subject: A BUSINESS PROPOSAL
body:
Dear Mr. Michael.
nc33826@***.com

Friend,

Thank you very much for your prompt response to my investment offer , it is
unfortunate that
you are contacting me from that part of the World UK, The home of Scammers
and pretendards who claims to be genuine , I said this because there are
millions of SCAMMERS claiming to come from UK. therefore , I do not ever
beleive any one that claim to have come from there , therefore , I do not
think of furthering this investment with you or ever disclaosing or
revealing any information regarding this transaction out.


  Have a nice day with
  Thanks and God bless
  Dr. Mele Kolo Kyari.

subject: Re: A BUSINESS PROPOSAL
body:
Dear Dr. Mele Kolo Kyari,

Thank you for your email. I understand your concerns about scams and appreciate your warning. However, I assure you that I am a genuine person and not involved in any fraudulent activities.

I apologize if my previous message gave you the wrong impression. I am actually interested in learning more about your investment offer. Could you please provide me with some additional details? What kind of investment is it? What are the potential returns and risks involved?

I value transparency and would like to make an informed decision before proceeding further. Thank you for your understanding.

Best wishes,
Michael
